verbs.description: The case for [V: selling] [ARG1: influence] by Trump lawyer Michael Cohen just keeps getting stronger . The BBC reports that Cohen was paid $ 400,000 by the Ukrainian government to arrange a meeting between that country ’s president , Petro Poroshenko , and Trump . And he did . And then Ukraine stopped cooperating with the Mueller investigation into Paul Manafort . A high - ranking …
